name: Labyrinth (itch) (LevChickie)
description:
Collect magic elixirs to boost your health while you fight your way out of the labyrinth. Beware the shadowmonsters and the lava pits that can hurt you.

How to Use:
Click: Attack

WASD or Arrows: Movement

Space: Jump

This video game project is done by one developer, therefore it lacks some essential parts I did not have time for, such as voices and music.
